overview: Kink and explosive family matters abound as Daisy plots to black-mail her lesbian step-mother Magdalene by secretly video-taping her romp with the much younger Bobbi, and Samantha must sleep with Dana to keep the condemning video from being circulated. Faye gets seduced by the family business partner while the neighbor girl wet-dreams about Faye and her stepmom.
title: Imperfect Angels 3
